CommunityPage1.heading: Information Sharing
CommunityPage1.1: We do not sell or provide personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
CommunityPage1.2: When necessary for the execution of a contract or the provision of a service
CommunityPage1.3: When required by law, court, or government authorities
CommunityPage1.4: With trusted service providers who assist us in delivering services (e.g., hosting, cloud solutions, technical support) — while adhering to the same standards of security and confidentiality

CommunityPage2.heading: Data Storage and Protection
CommunityPage2.1: Personal data is stored in secure systems and is accessed only by authorized personnel.
CommunityPage2.2: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
CommunityPage2.3: Information is retained only for as long as necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.

CommunityPage3.heading: Policy Changes
CommunityPage3.1: AI Innovations reserves the right to update this policy as needed.
CommunityPage3.2: All changes will be published on this page, with the date of the latest revision indicated.
CommunityPage3.3: We recommend periodically reviewing the page to stay informed about how we protect your data.

CommunityPage4.heading: User Rights
CommunityPage4.1: Access your personal data and information about how it is processed
CommunityPage4.2: Request correction, updating, or deletion (“right to be forgotten”)
CommunityPage4.3: Object to the processing of data for marketing purposes
CommunityPage4.4: Withdraw your consent at any time
CommunityPage4.5: File a complaint with the Commission for Personal Data Protection (CPDP) if you believe your rights have been violated
